security: Release of this information could violate privacy regulations concerning personnel records.
summary: This document is a personnel action form indicating the removal of James A. Noel from the CIA Retirement and Disability System on May 5, 1968.
summary_one_paragraph: Personnel action form, serial number 055292, documents the removal of James A. Noel from the CIA Retirement and Disability System, effective May 5, 1968. The action is voluntary and is authorized under PL 88-643 Sect. 203. Noel's official station is San Francisco, California, and the form includes financial analysis details, organizational designations (DDP/DOD), position title, career service designation (ID), classification schedule, grade, step, and salary information, along with authentications and coding for personnel and financial systems.
title: Personnel Action: Removal from CIA Retirement and Disability System
